sql-map.name: AdvancesProductAccHeadMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_ACHD (PROD_ID, AC_CLOSING_CHRG, MISC_SERV_CHRG, STAT_CHRG, AC_DEBIT_INT, PENAL_INT, AC_CREDIT_INT, CLEARING_INT, EXPIRY_INT, EXCESS_LIMIT, CHQBK_ISSUE_CHRG, STOP_PAY_CHRG, CHQ_RET_CHRG_OUTWARD, CHQ_RET_CHRG_INWARD, FOLIO_CHRG_AC ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #acClosingChrg:VARCHAR#, #miscServChrg:VARCHAR#, #statChrg:VARCHAR#, #acDebitInt:VARCHAR#, #penalInt:VARCHAR#, #acCreditInt:VARCHAR#, #clearingInt:VARCHAR#, #expiryInt:VARCHAR#, #excessLimit:VARCHAR#, #chqbkIssueChrg:VARCHAR#, #stopPayChrg:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgOutward:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgInward:VARCHAR#, #folioChrgAc:VARCHAR#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_ACHD SET PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#, AC_CLOSING_CHRG = #acClosingChrg:VARCHAR#, MISC_SERV_CHRG = #miscServChrg:VARCHAR#, STAT_CHRG = #statChrg:VARCHAR#, AC_DEBIT_INT = #acDebitInt:VARCHAR#, PENAL_INT = #penalInt:VARCHAR#, AC_CREDIT_INT = #acCreditInt:VARCHAR#, CLEARING_INT = #clearingInt:VARCHAR#, EXPIRY_INT = #expiryInt:VARCHAR#, EXCESS_LIMIT = #excessLimit:VARCHAR#, CHQBK_ISSUE_CHRG = #chqbkIssueChrg:VARCHAR#, STOP_PAY_CHRG = #stopPayChrg:VARCHAR#, CHQ_RET_CHRG_OUTWARD = #chqRetChrgOutward:VARCHAR#, CHQ_RET_CHRG_INWARD = #chqRetChrgInward:VARCHAR#, FOLIO_CHRG_AC = #folioChrgAc:VARCHAR# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId#
